name: Tot Soccer
description: SFRPD Tot Soccer classes are designed to introduce the fundamentals of this globally beloved sport in a safe, fun, and positive environment. Through a variety of skill - development drills and games, the coaches will help boost each child's confidence, physical fitness, and motor skills. All classes will be held inside the gymnasium.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
